name: react-express-starter
description: A starter React+Express setup for new projects

scripts.build: npm run install:client && npm run install:server && cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && yarn run build
scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm config set ignore-scripts true && npm i --g yarn@1.22.19
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd server && npm run lint:fix && cd ../client && npm run lint:fix
scripts.sort: npx sort-package-json && cd server && npx sort-package-json && cd ../client && npx sort-package-json
scripts.start:dev: concurrently 'cd client && yarn dev' 'cd server && npm run dev'
